directions: Heat milk and eggnog together in a saucepan over medium-low heat until heated through, about 5 minutes. Stir in chocolate and mint-chocolate baking pieces; cook until chocolate is melted and smooth, 5 to 10 more minutes. Pour into 2 mugs.
ingredients: 3/4 cup mint-chocolate baking pieces (such as Andes®)
title: Minty Eggnog Hot Chocolate
